en-US.alert_about: This shortcut generates and updates the Shortcuts database in LaunchCuts. This requires LaunchCuts for iOS.
en-US.alert_generate_progress: {{PERCENTAGE}}% complete. {{NUM}} out of {{COUNT}} shortcuts have been processed in {{DURATION}} seconds.
en-US.alert_shortcuts_map: Generating the shortcuts map of {{COUNT}} shortcuts will take about {{TIME}} minutes to complete.
en-US.prompt_updateShortcuts: Update the database of shortcuts in LaunchCuts.
